messages.title: RUTH DAVIDSON FOR A STRONG OPPOSITION
messages.content: HOLDING THE SNP TO ACCOUNT, FOCUSING ON THE ISSUES THAT MATTER, NO TO A 2ND INDEPENDENCE REFERENDUM

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will hold the SNP to account so we get the government we deserve.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Keep Scotland better within the UK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will stand up for the United Kingdom so Scottish jobs are kept safe.
We will oppose a 2nd referendum so the SNP cannot drag Scotland back to more division.
We will campaign for higher standards so the next generation have the chance to get on in life, no matter where you live.
We will support an NHS that has the funds it needs so it can provide dignity and care for all.
We will campaign for pay packets to be protected so Scottish taxes are never higher than the rest of the UK.

issues.health: We will support an NHS that has the funds it needs so it can provide dignity and care for all.

quotes.text: Only Ruth Davidson will stand up to the SNP on the issues that matter.

images.caption: Ruth Davidson’s Six Point Plan for Strong Opposition
Ruth Davidson FOR A STRONG OPPOSITION
Martin LAIDLAW Ruth Davidson’s Candidate for Kirkcaldy
3 THINGS TO REMEMBER BEFORE YOU VOTE

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet highlights various points such as holding the SNP to account and opposing a second independence referendum. The personal statement, political experience, contact information including social media details, endorsements, and specific issues like Brexit, economy, education, environment, governance, immigration, and social welfare are not provided in the leaflet.
